snippet: The man who led a people to end apartheid in South Africa and set a moral example for the world.
abstract: Editorial eulogizes Nelson Mandela, who has died at age 95; contends Mandela fully deserved the legendary status he enjoyed around the world; maintains it will be up to a new generation of South African leaders to resolve their countries' problems, and that all of them owe a historic debt to Mandela.
lead_paragraph: The man who led a people to end apartheid in South Africa and set a moral example for the world.
